newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market slow - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market slow - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the panhandle area Friday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested. Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry.
Sales reported on 200 slaughter steers and 300 heifers following weekly movement of 155,700 head.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1200 lbs 68.00. Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 68.00. Confirmed - 500 Week Ago - 16,600 Year Ago - 1,000
